name: Toshi Tools
description: ToshiTools is an enclosed ecosystem of instruments designed to enhance the trading experience. Our first DApp will help you analyze, scrape and track wallets on the Ethereum Blockchain. This a simple beta tool that provides users analytics on trader performance visualized on customizable graphs. A sort of DexTools for wallets. From a First Principles perspective. The Blockchain is open source and immutable. That means there's a permanent record of all transactions that you can't alter. This is the difference between traditional trading and crypto. one world has limit information while the other has infinite information. The new problem is too much data, massive overload. What if we were able to digest all that data, extract and refine it into quick easy to understand signals.
